item.title: Python 101: My Experiences
item.description: I'll say it out right: even though I recognize the wide range of uses for Python and the affection that many have for it, right now it feels clumsy and awkward as I try to make my brain understand it. Still, let's explore some neat stuff. One cool feature in R Markdown allows R and Python to communicate by utilizing the reticulate package. library(reticulate) One example of how this could be useful is with tidying.
